pr_title: Redesign: Fix View Recovery Phrase Flow and other security related flows [NMA-299]

timeline.message: Open up CheckPinDialog and its view model classes to be extended
Add DecryptSeedWithPinDialog and its view model classes
Connect Security -> View Recovery Phrase to the new flow
Undo changes to VerifySeedActivity since ViewSeedActivity will be used
Use new DecryptSeedWithPinDialog to start Secure Now flow

Allow for the fingerprint to be used to decrypt a seed

open up a few more items in CheckPinDialog as protected

Fix Backup Wallet to File on first time

If the app is newly installed, the Back up Wallet to File command
will ask for the permissions and then require the user to press the
Backup Wallet to File button again.
Put the advanced security setting being a CheckPinDialog
Correct grammar: Backup vs Back Up
Require PIN only for security menu items

timeline.bodyText: You can add the @JvmStatic annotation to createIntent(context: Context, seed: Array<String>) method definition in VerifySeedActivity class in order to be able to simply call VerifySeedActivity.createIntent(this, seedArray) without Companion.
timeline.author: tomasz-ludek

timeline.message: Refactor CheckPinDialog to eliminate need to duplicate some methods in child classes
Modify initSharedModel() to take a FragmentActivity parameter
